entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
